Starting in January (the 14th?), TBS (Tokyo, not Turner) will begin airing =
"Shinsengumi Peacemaker," adapted from the manga Shinsegumi Imon Peacemaker=
.  Still too early for many details or an official site.

Known cast: Suga =
Kenta (Tetsunosuke), Furuhata Yuta (Tatsunosuke), Yanagishita Masaru (Okita=
), Izaki Yusuke (Harada), Araki Hirofumi (Yoshida Toshimaro), and Sakakibar=
a Tetsuji.

Original articles:  Hochi yomiura ( http://hochi.yomiuri.co.jp/=
entertainment/news/20091115-OHT1T00061.htm ), Mainichi ( http://mainichi.jp=
/enta/photo/news/20091114mog00m200013000c.html )

This should become availa=
ble on d-addicts, but no guarantees as dramas are getting more difficult to=
 acquire.  Also, no news on if it will be picked up by a fansubber if the r=
aws are available.  (The drama announcement was made only yesterday.)
